articles.author: Paris Marx
articles.title: Why America's Electric Car Push Isn't Working - Business Insider
articles.description: The sudden slowdown in electric car sales is a symptom of a much uglier problem.
articles.content: Electric vehicles were supposed to be inevitable. Two years ago President Joe Biden climbed behind the wheel of a beefy white electric Hummer to tout his plan to make half of all new cars sold electr… [+10985 chars]
